text: jasindeul-ui yeonghon-eul pal-abeolin daegalo geudeul-i sadeul-in geos-i cham-eulo saaghadoda! geudeul-eun hananimkkeseo naelisin geos-eul bulsinhani ineun, hananimkkeseo dangsin-ui eunhyelosseo geubun-ui jongbogdeul jung wonhasineun ja-ege gyesileul naelineun geos-e daehan jeoggaesim ttaemun-ila. geuleohge geudeul-eun (hananim-ui) noyeoum-e noyeoum-eul cholaehayeossnola. bulsinjadeul-egeneun chiyog-ui beol-i iss-eul geos-ila
